creditline: Gift of David Ackley in honor of Susan and the late John Ullrich
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: sword: wide blade with two hooks on end; blade incised with linear design on both sides; wood handle with textured knob on end; scabbard: rectangular shape; black hide stitching on brown hide in loop designs; two large loop handles
medium: Animal hide and hair, wood, metal, plant fibers
title: Short Sword and Scabbard
